titlestmt.titleproper: Guide to the President's Office, Yale University, Records Concerning Social Activities and Gatherings
President's Office, Yale University, Records Concerning Social Activities and Gatherings
titlestmt.author: compiled by Daniel Hartwig

publicationstmt.publisher: Yale University. Department of Manuscripts and Archives

profiledesc.creation: This finding aid was produced using ArchivesSpace on Friday December 7, 2018 at 11:53

did.unittitle: President's office, Yale University, records concerning social activities and gatherings

repository.corpname: Yale University. Department of Manuscripts and Archives

did.abstract: The records consist of correspondence, planning documents, lists, and other materials documenting receptions, dinners, and other social events hosted by the president of Yale University for faculty, alumni, donors, and visitors. Also included are records documenting trips taken by the president and the management of the president's residence.

odd.head: General note
odd.p: Forms part of Yale Record Group 2-A (YRG 2-A), Records of the Yale president's office.

acqinfo.head: Immediate Source of Acquisition
acqinfo.p: The records were transferred from the President's Office, 1993.

accessrestrict.head: Conditions Governing Access
accessrestrict.p: Access to the records is restricted.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: President's Office, Yale University, Records Concerning Social Activities and Gatherings (RU 102). Manuscripts and Archives, Yale University Library.

arrangement.head: Arrangement
arrangement.p: The records are arranged alphabetically by subject or form of material.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: The records consist of correspondence, planning documents, lists, and other materials documenting receptions, dinners, and other social events hosted by the president of Yale University for faculty, alumni, donors, and visitors. Also included are records documenting trips taken by the president and the management of the president's residence.
